import{MONTHS,USERS}from'../constants.js';//const log = console.log;
export var getFirstDay=function getFirstDay(){var d=new Date();var firstDay=new Date(d.getFullYear(),d.getMonth(),1);return firstDay.getDay();};export var getMonth=function getMonth(){var months=MONTHS;var d=new Date();return months[d.getMonth()];};export var getMonthDay=function getMonthDay(time){var d=new Date(time);return[d.getUTCMonth()+1,d.getUTCDate()];};export var loadAppointments=function loadAppointments(user){var appointments=[];var reminders=USERS[user].reminders;for(var i=0;i<reminders['Medical Health'].length;i++){if(reminders['Medical Health'][i].subCategory==='Appointments'){appointments.push(reminders['Medical Health'][i]);}}return appointments;};export var findApps=function findApps(lists,date,month){var app=[];for(var i=0;i<lists.length;i++){var appTime=getMonthDay(lists[i].time);if(appTime[1]===date){var d=new Date(lists[i].time);var formatTime=d.getHours()+':'+d.getMinutes();app.push([lists[i].name,formatTime]);}}return app;};export var loadStreaks=function loadStreaks(user){var streaks=[];return streaks;};export var findStreaks=function findStreaks(lists,date){var streaks=[];return streaks;};
